question: Which of the following includes both microscopic plants like algae and animals like crustaceans and protozoansÂ found in all aquatic ecosystems, except certain swift moving waters?
explanation:
Plankton includes both microscopic plants like algae (phytoplankton) and animals like crustaceans and protozoans
(zooplankton). They are found in all aquatic ecosystems, except in certain swift moving waters.
